1: Every morning when I woke up I hurried to eat my breakfast.
2: Then I would take my blue blouse and run out of the house to find my friend Muthoni.
3: Once I found Muthoni, we would forget everything else.
4:
Muthoni and I would play hide and seek. 
I hid in big trees, while Muthoni went behind huts.
5:
Muthoni and I went to the village well together. 
We went to fetch firewood together. 
We went to school together.
6: We promised each other that we would work hard in school and graduate.
7:
But one day, Muthoni did not come to school. 
I stood at the door to our class and waited for her to arrive. 
But she did not come.
8: When I returned home that day, I told my mother about my friend Muthoni.
9: I continued with school, but I missed Muthoni very much.
10: But every day I went to school, I looked for Muthoni everywhere.
11: Now I am a lady, but I still miss my friend Muthoni.
